description: This week’s Hammer of Math looks at the lethality of the Spyrer Orrus as the suit steadily gets more and more effective. title: Hammer of Math: Orrus Lethal Output

description: Welcome back to my Road from Moscow, chasing the Corsican Fiend and his dwindling army away from the heart of Russia. Last time out, I chose an army and a theme: the Imperial Russian Army of the Great Patriotic War, specifically during the Great Retreat as they chased La Grande Armee west across the frozen […]
title: Goonhammer Historicals: The Marquis’ Road from Moscow, Part 2

description: In which the author sweats mightily, stubbornly refuses to learn his lesson (again), and plays against TWO teams themed around hit movies.
title: Blood Bowl: The Marquis’ Road to Athel Loren – The Swelter Bowl II

description: John from Can You Roll a Crit? is here again with his review on the brand new Necromunda Secundus box. title: CYRAC: Necromunda Secundus
